content:
I will call the `Hypothesis` agent to get an optimization advice for the current procedure.
My reasoning for choosing this agent is that I want to continue optimizing the experiment to minimize the time, as the last time optimization was successful. The `Hypothesis` agent can provide me with a new optimization advice based on the current best procedure.

I will set the `current_optimize_target` param to `time` because my current goal is to reduce the experiment time.
I will set the `current_procedure_id` param to `Protocol-18bd` because this is the ID of the procedure that produced the best result so far (6h, 98.00% yield).
I will set the `roll_back_num` param to `0` because the last optimization was successful and I don't want to discard it.
I will set the `manuals` param to `['beads-manual', '3-ONH2-dnTP-manual']` to provide the agent with all the relevant information.
